Job Title: DevOps Software Engineer

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
DevOps Software Engineer Chicago, IL Reports To: Director, Information Technology & Security    BAI is the financial services industry’s leading provider of powerful tools, relevant content, and meaningful connections. Our mission is to give financial services leaders the confidence to make smart business decisions because a strong financial services industry helps consumers, businesses and communities thrive.  We are looking for a DevOps Software Engineer to join our team and help us deliver high-quality software solutions for internal and customer use.   Responsibilities: 
Designing, developing, and testing applications in Microsoft .NET, PHP, SQL, and other programming environments.  Deploying and monitoring software applications using automated tools.  Automating configuration, security, and deployment of infrastructure in cloud environments using infrastructure-as-code and similar tools.  Collaborate with other developers, testers, and stakeholders to ensure the software meets the business needs and follows the best practices.   Requirements: 
A bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field  3+ years of experience with SQL databases and queries  Proficiency in one or more programming languages, such as C# or JavaScript  Familiarity with PowerShell and other scripting languages  Experience with Power BI and CRM Dynamics 365, or the ability to learn quickly  Experience with Microsoft Azure and other cloud platforms, or the ability to learn quickly  Experience with DevOps tools and methodologies, such as Git, Azure DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.  Experience with infrastructure as code and CI/CD tools, such as Terraform, Azure DevOps, Ansible, Chef, Puppet, etc., is a plus  Excellent communication, problem-solving, and teamwork skills  A passion for learning new technologies and improving your skills   BAI offers an outstanding benefit package including comprehensive insurance coverage, a 401(k) plan with company match, generous vacation/personal time programs, BAI Workflex which includes a hybrid work model and bonus potential with the ability to work in a collaborative, team-oriented environment.  BAI will not sponsor applicants for work visas and as a precondition of employment, you must be authorized to work in the United States permanently.

Experience Level (if available): None
